name: Badger Brawl
description:
Badger Brawl is a 2.5D local multiplayer game.

The ULTIMATE battle is here! The badgers are attacking the humans. The humans are trying to save their neighbourhood while the badgers are trying to get their territory back. Join this fight and choose which side YOU want to fight for!

Grab a friend, or three, and a couch. Most importantly, have FUN. Badger Brawl is meant to be played during parties. This, of course, requires that you DO have friends. Sorry, Loners, but this game is local multiplayer only.

______________________________

How to play:

Start by choosing which team you want to fight for and which character you want to play as. When all players are ready hit start and the game begins! Run around in the level, pic up the randomly spawning weapons, shoot your opponent team and try not to get hit!

______________________________

Features:

  • 2 teams
  • 4 characters
  • 2-4 players
  • 12 different weapons

______________________________

Requirements:

  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-series
  • GPU:  NVIDIA GTX 600-series
  • RAM: 8 GB
  • At least 2 XBOX Controllers

______________________________

ATTENTION!

You may have to connect the controllers after the game has started. Otherwise, they may not work properly.
